decodeAndGetFinalizedCOLLAState(Asset st.details: Decode and load the finalized COLLAState of the asset

encodeAndSetCOLLATerms(Asset storage,COL.notice: All non zero values of the overwrittenTerms object are stored. It does not check if overwrittenAttributesMap actually marks attribute as overwritten.
